document_data.caption: So many things wrong with this.
document_data.name: Daemon's Bane
document_data.mainbody:
A '''daemon's bane''' was a diabolic amulet found in the [[Utter East]] during the [[Bloodforge Wars]] ([[648 DR|648]]â€“[[657 DR]]).

It was the effigy of a horned skull on a six-pointed star hanging on a chain. It granted a protection against attacks from virtuous creatures (such as those produced at a temple of Lathander on a [[mystical site]]).
